Producer: Mark Brown, Carl Craig, Vivica A. Fox
Rating: PG-13 (Crude and Sexual Content|Some Thematic Material|Language)
Synopsis: Stylist Jenny Smith (Vivica A. Fox) gets the shock of her life when charming lawyer Michael (Darrin Dewitt Henson) steps into her beauty salon -- a beloved community hub -- and announces that the city of Baltimore has scheduled her building for demolition. Refusing to go down without a fight, Smith embarks on a quest to stop Michael and the Department of Public Works. But, as their court date approaches, Smith finds herself unwittingly falling for Michael.
Title: The Salon
